name: Prawn Ravioli Filling
recipeIngredient: 1. Heat the butter and oil in a large frying pan, add the prawns, garlic and spring onions and stir fry for a few minutes until the prawns turn pink and are just cooked through.
2. Transfer the mixture to a food processor, season with salt and pepper and process until finely chopped but not too smooth. Allow to cool before using.
